attacks.name: Ripple
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brine
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
